fields_of_interest: Culture and media, Education and training, Youth, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health
eu_initiatives:
- European Commission communication on combating HIV/AIDS in the EU and neighbouring countries 
- EU Health Programme (2014-2020) 
- Confidence Building Measures Program
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit: The Soros Foundation-Moldova is a non-governmental, non-for-profit and non-political organization which was established in 1992 by the financier and the philanthropist George Soros to promote the development of an open society in Moldova by developing and implementing a range of programs and activities that address specific areas of needs including legal reform, good governance,  public health, civic engagement and media.
